T.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id ;

F.query: select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id right join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id;
select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.study_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id;
select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id and d.study_id = md.id join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id;

select md.id as mdid,  d.id as did,  i.id as iid from medidata_depots md join depots d on d.medidata_depot_id = md.id and d.study_id = md.id right join unnumbered_inventory_items i on d.id = i.depot_id;
